name: Appeal Processes
description: There are a number of processes for appealing decisions made by Golden Gate Regional Center (GGRC) regarding the rights, eligibility or services of persons served by the agency. Appealing processes are: - Appeal Process - Consumer Rights Complaint Process - Early Start Mediation Conference Requests - Early Start Due Process Hearing Requests - Early Start State Complaint Process Please go to http://www.ggrc.org/services/appeal-processes for more information.
